com.atherys.quests.dialog

Class DialogMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atherys.quests.dialog.DialogMsg

  • public class DialogMsg
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for formatting and sending Dialog-related messages to players.

      • info

        public static void info(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                        java.lang.Object... msg)
        Sends an info message to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the message will be sent.
        msg - The message. Will later be wrapped in a Text object.

      • error

        public static void error(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                         java.lang.Object... msg)
        Sends an error message to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the message will be sent.
        msg - The message. Will later be wrapped in a Text object.

      • info

        public static void info(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                        java.lang.Object... msg)
        Sends an info message to the given user. Uses User.isOnline() to determine if the user is online first. If so, the message will be delivered, else not.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to whom the message will be sent.
        msg - The message. Will later be wrapped in a Text object.

      • error

        public static void error(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                         java.lang.Object... msg)
        Sends an error message to the given user. Uses User.isOnline() to determine if the user is online first. If so, the message will be delivered, else not.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to whom the message will be sent.
        msg - The message. Will later be wrapped in a Text object.

        public static void response(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                            int i,
                            DialogNode response)
